title: Google splits ‘Web & App Activity’ up with new ‘Workspace search history’ setting
content:
On the Google My Activity page, one of the very first controls shown is Web & App Activity. Google will soon break up that setting with a new “Workspace search history” preference.

more…

The post Google splits ‘Web & App Activity’ up with new ‘Workspace search history’ setting appeared first on 9to5Google.
